Articles.Content:
This one is too sweet not to share with you guys. Take-off from sea or land at about 30m/s with no pilot input whatsoever. Top speeda bit sluggish at around 110 m/s but compensated by the incredible autonomy. Very maneuvrable either in water, on land or in the air. 

 

Landing in water should be under 40m/s flap down with action group 1 will allow you to slow down pretty quickly.

 

 

dl: http://kerbalx.com/crafts/8386/edit

Edited December 22, 2015 by narfi

Welcome to the forums!

Cool looking seaplane! I love it! Thing is, you should change the link to the one everyone else sees, since the link you have sends us to the edit page, and nobody can see the page except you... I think the link you want is http://kerbalx.com/narfi/albatrosmk2.

I give this an A plus. it's gr8 m8 I rate 8/8.

Seaplanes are all the rage these days, aren't they?

Nice seaplane

Has anyone made a bigger seaplane
